Mythical Maze for Summer Reading Challenge 2014

Jul 18, 2014 • Jo Dixon

Summer Reading Challenge reading list

Stuck for reading inspiration over the summer? Try this myths and legends list when you take the Summer Reading Challenge – reserve and collect from your library:

Picture books

  • Sir Scallywag and the Deadly Dragon Poo by Giles Andrea & Korky Paul
  • The Very Messy Mermaid by Tracey Corderoy
  • Julia Donaldson The Troll
  • John Fardell The Day Louis Got Eaten
  • Caryl Hart How to Catch a Dragon
  • Sue Hendra Supertato
  • Teresa Heapy Very Little Red Riding Hood
  • Colin McNaugthon Giant
  • Rachael Mortimer Jack and the Jelly Bean Stalk
  • Nick Sharratt The Foggy Foggy Forest
  • Steve Smallman Dragon Stew
  • Ed Vere Bedtime for Monsters
  • Fiona Watt That’s not my Dragon
  • Chris Wormell George and the Dragon

Beginner reads and short chapter books

  • Anne Adeney The Frog Emperor
  • Malorie Blackman The Monster Crisp Guzzler
  • Malachy Doyle Too Many Webs for Anansi
  • Josephine Feeney Robin Hood’s Day
  • Liz Flanagan Cara and the Wizard
  • Mick Gowar The Gold-giving Snake
  • Sue Graves Benny and the Monster
  • Russell Punter The Wooden Horse
  • A.B. Saddlewick Big Fright
  • Lily Small Fairy animals of Misty Wood

Junior novels

  • Ruth Eastham Arrowhead
  • Charlie Fletcher Dragon Shield
  • Janet Foxley Muncle Trogg
  • Jamila Gavin Blackberry Blue
  • Julia Golding Young Knights of the Round Table
  • Eva Ibbotson Let Sleeping Monsters Lie and Other Cautionary Tales
  • Josh Lacey The Dragonsitter’s Island
  • Don Lari First Aid for Fairies and Other Fabled Beasts
  • Matthew Morgan Sea Monsters and Other Delicacies
  • Jenny Nimmo The Secret Kingdom
  • Philip Reeve Goblins
  • Jason Rohan The Sword of Kuhomi
  • Daniela Sacerdoti Really Weird Removals
  • Darren Shan Hagurosan
  • Paul Stewart Muddle Earth
  • Claire Taylor-Smith The Dragon’s Song
  • Julia Wills Fleeced
  • Holly Webb Emily Feather and the Enchanted Door

Non–fiction

  • Douglas Steer Dr Ernest Drake’s Dragonology: The Complete Book of Dragons
  • Tracey Turner Beasts and Monsters
